text: Sri Lanka Citizen Services - Mock Government Document 1. Birth Certificate Registration To register a birth, parents must submit: - Hospital Birth Report - National Identity Cards of parents - Marriage Certificate (if applicable) Processing time: 3–5 working days. 2. National Identity Card (NIC) Application Required documents: - Birth Certificate - Grama Niladhari Certificate - Two passport-sized photographs Processing time: 7–10 working days. 3. Passport Application Guidelines Applicants must provide: - NIC - Birth Certificate - Completed Passport Application Form K35A - Two color photographs Processing time: 10 working days (normal), 1 day (express). 4. School Admission Criteria Documents required: - Parent's proof of residence - Child’s Birth Certificate - Previous school records (if transferring) This is a mock document created for AI search testing purposes.
